text: Chilliwack is a city in the Canadian province of British Columbia. The population of Chilliwack was 93,203 in 2021. The mayor of Chilliwack is Ken Popove. The Stó:lō people lived in the area between 5,000 and 10,000 years ago. The population grew from 1857 to 1859 when gold was found in the Fraser Canyon. Over 40,000 gold miners had traveled to the goldfields and many of them traveled through the Chilliwack area. Chilliwack was incorporated as a town in 1873 and was the third municipality in British Columbia. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official city website Category:Cities in British Columbia Category:1873 establishments in Canada
title: Chilliwack
